title: U.S. per capita consumption of dried fruit 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013/14 and 2014/15.
The highest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 2.44 was reached at Year 2013/14
The lowest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 2.14 was reported at Year 2009/10
min_summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has stayed the same over the Year.
mid_summary: Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has increased over the Year.
